We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Recruiter

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	The Senior Recruiter will conduct final-stage interviews, develop assessment frameworks, analyze candidate data, and collaborate with key stakeholders to enhance the overall recruitment process.
	This role requires strong analytical capability, sound judgment, and a proven ability to manage senior-level hiring.


Key Responsibilities


	Lead final interviews for senior and executive positions, leveraging reports and insights from the Talent Acquisition team.
	Develop and implement standardized assessment templates to support structured decision-making.
	Analyze candidate performance data and provide insights to inform hiring recommendations.
	Collaborate with the Performance team to track post-hire outcomes and ensure alignment with interview results.
	Enhance recruitment processes to improve efficiency, consistency, and candidate experience.
	Provide guidance and support to Talent Acquisition team members.
	Contribute to the development and execution of recruitment strategies.


Key Performance Indicators


	Time-to-hire for senior and executive roles
	Quality of hire, measured through performance and feedback
	Candidate satisfaction and experience ratings
	Effectiveness of the interview process
	Diversity and inclusion outcomes


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Human Resources, Business, or a related discipline
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in recruitment, with a focus on senior and executive-level hiring
	Demonstrated success in talent acquisition and stakeholder management
	Strong interviewing, assessment, and analytical skills
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Proficiency with HR assessment tools and platforms.


Preferred Qualifications:


	Master&rsquo;s degree or professional HR/recruitment certification
	Experience in a fast-paced or high-growth environment.


Salary
N900,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to:&nbsp;careers@conceptgroup-ng.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Executive & Technical Assistant to the MD",
  "description": "Colossus Investments Limited is a leading agro-commodity export, trading, and processing company with strong operations across Nigeria. We specialize in the sourcing, processing, and global export of cashew, soybeans, cocoa, and other agricultural commodities while supporting farmers and maintaining sustainable supply chain practices.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Executive &amp; Technical Assistant to the MD

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time, Executive Staff
Reports To: Managing Director

Job Summary


	The Executive &amp; Technical Assistant will provide high-level executive, analytical, and project support to the Managing Director.
	This role combines executive administration, data analysis, business intelligence, and strategic project coordination.
	The ideal candidate must be highly organized, analytically strong, and able to function as the MD&rsquo;s right hand, supporting decision-making across trading, processing, operations, and corporate activities.


Key Responsibilities
Executive Support &amp; Administration:


	Manage the MD&rsquo;s calendar, schedules, meetings, and travel logistics.
	Prepare materials for board meetings, investor engagements, and strategy sessions.
	Draft, review, and edit emails, reports, and high-level correspondence.
	Act as the primary liaison between the MD and internal/external stakeholders.


Technical Analysis &amp; Data Management:


	Develop and maintain financial and operational models using advanced Excel tools (Power Query, pivot tables, automation, data visualization).
	Consolidate and analyze commodity prices, supply chain metrics, and production data.
	Ensure accuracy and integrity across all data, dashboards, and performance reports.


Presentation &amp; Reporting:


	Create high-quality executive-level presentations for strategy, fundraising, and internal reviews.
	Produce periodic and ad-hoc reports on market trends, business performance, and project outcomes.
	Convert complex data points into clear business insights and visual reports.


Project Management Support:


	Support the MD in planning and monitoring major business initiatives.
	Coordinate deliverables across departments to ensure deadlines are met.
	Track project milestones, prepare updates, and assist with documentation and SOP development.


Special Projects &amp; Analytical Problem-Solving:


	Conduct market research and competitive analysis within the agri-commodity sector.
	Evaluate new business opportunities, investment prospects, and digital transformation initiatives.
	Handle open-ended analytical tasks and provide structured recommendations.


Qualifications &amp; Requirements
Essential (Must-Have):


	B.Sc. / B.A. in Agriculture, Agribusiness, Business Administration, Finance, IT, or a related field.
	3&ndash;5 years of experience as an Executive Assistant, Business Analyst, or similar role.
	Strong analytical ability; advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel is mandatory.
	Excellent PowerPoint/Google Slides presentation skills.
	Exceptional communication, writing, and organizational skills.
	High level of discretion, professionalism, and reliability.
	Ability to work independently, multitask, and anticipate the MD&rsquo;s needs.


Highly Desirable (Nice-to-Have):


	Certification in Project Management (PMP, PRINCE2, Agile).
	Experience in commodity trading, agribusiness, manufacturing, or FMCG.
	Familiarity with ERP, BI tools (Power BI/Tableau), or data-driven systems.


Personal Attributes:


	Integrity &amp; Discretion: Able to handle confidential and sensitive information.
	Resilience: Comfortable working under pressure in a fast-paced environment.
	Intellectual Curiosity: Eager to learn and understand business drivers.
	Proactiveness: Takes ownership and anticipates challenges before they arise.
	Professionalism: Presents well and interacts confidently with managers, partners, and clients.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidate should send their updated CV and a brief cover letter to:&nbsp;hr@colossusinvestments.com&nbsp;using&nbsp;&ldquo;Executive &amp; Technical Assistant&rdquo; as the subject of the mail.",
